First, to use GPIOs inside PHP, you need to add the Apache user (www-data) to the sudoers.
{{{
$ sudo visudo
}}}
and add the following line add the end of file :
{{{
www-data ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD: ALL
}}}

Then include the library (gpio.php) in your PHP script and you are ready to use it.

{{{
include("gpio.php");

$gpio = new GPIO(); // get the GPIO API
$gpio->init();      // initialize GPIO pins

$gpio->GPIO_AVAILABLE // contains mapped GPIOs :
// [0, 1, 4, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11, 14, 15, 17, 18, 21, 22, 23, 24, 25];

$gpio->getALTPins() // return an array with ALT activated GPIOs :
// [14, 15] by default and until next version

$gpio->setDirection(0, "in");   // setup GPIO 0 in input
$gpio->setDirection(1, "in");   // setup GPIO 1 in input
$gpio->setDirection(24, "out"); // setup GPIO 24 in output
$gpio->setDirection(25, "out"); // setup GPIO 25 in output

$gpio->getValue(0);     // return GPIO 0 value
$gpio->getValue(1);     // return GPIO 1 value
$gpio->setValue(24, 0); // fall GPIO 24
$gpio->setValue(25, 1); // raise GPIO 25

$gpio->release(); // release the GPIO (reset and discard GPIO state)
}}}
